title: The effect of chrysin on ischemia-reperfusion injury in the rat epigastric artery skin island flap.
abstract: The return of oxygenated blood by reperfusion after ischemia triggers paradoxical tissue damage known as ischemia-reperfusion (I/R) injury. This study aims to investigate the effect of chrysin (C) on I/R injury in epigastric island flaps in rats.
journal: Ulusal travma ve acil cerrahi dergisi = Turkish journal of trauma & emergency surgery : TJTES
